name: BetMonitor
header: Custom Reporting Software for a Gambling Operator
description:
A tool designed for office staff to streamline daily tasks through live betting pattern analysis, reporting tools, and QOL utilities.

- Features a live bet feed, daily/monthly reporting, and utility tools for quick decision-making.
- Integrates Pipedrive, Google APIs, and internal systems for up-to-date client and compliance data.
- Provides live sports event updates via news feeds.
- Plays a critical role in assisting in-house traders with real-time information.

name: BetCalculator
description:
A calculator tool for calculating bet outcomes, improving customer support and aiding in staff training.

- Built with React and MUI to interface with the Betcruncher.js library.
- Assists in quickly checking potential returns, verifying payouts, and explaining wager breakdowns.
- Used both as a utility for staff and a learning tool for new employees.

name: PlaysTVScraper
header: Web Scraper for Plays.tv Using Wayback Machine
description:
A project to recover lost gaming clips from PlaysTV, a clip-sharing site that shut down in 2019.

- Scraped and retrieved 195 uploaded clips using Selenium and BeautifulSoup.
- Accessed archived content available through the Internet Archive's Wayback Machine.
- Recovered personal and friends' video memories for preservation.

name: AudioSwitcher
description:
A lightweight script for quickly toggling between audio output devices without navigating Windows settings.

- Lists available audio output devices and switches to the next one.
- Designed for convenience, enabling keybinding for fast access.

name: BackgroundChecker
description:
Background service to maintain a default desktop wallpaper and prevent unauthorized changes...

- Monitors desktop wallpaper changes and resets to the default image if altered.
- Sends a text notification upon change detection.
- Opens "Never Gonna Give You Up" at full volume as a deterrent.

name: RecipeApp
description:
An ongoing project to create a modern, lightweight alternative to recipe websites.

- Allows users to add, edit, and delete recipes.
- To include features for liking and commenting on shared recipes.
- Built as a learning project to enhance skills in React and C#.
